subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Ukraine (
Fig. 3
g).
Lviv Prov., Khmelnytskyi Prov., Kiev. Prov., Kherson Prov., Poltava Prov., Rivne Prov., Ternopil Prov., Cherkasy Prov., Mykolaiv Prov., Odessa Prov., Crimea, *Kharkiv Prov., Donetsk Prov.

General distribution. Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Poland , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Serbia , Macedonia , Bulgaria , Romania , Greece , Syria , Ukraine , Turkey , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Iran .
